description: Astilbe arendsii 'Amethyst' is an amazing variety of astilbe. It produces gorgeous, deep purplish-pink flower blooms from mid to late summer that look like mini plumes. It is also a robust, cold-tolerant perennial with attractive, glossy green foliage. This shade loving plant is easy to maintain and can bloom for years with minimal care. It also makes a great addition to shady areas where other varieties may struggle. Astilbe arendsii 'Amethyst' is a stunning and versatile plant that brings life and colour to the garden.
